name: report-mark2
description: LAN uzerinden erisilen PDF rapor doldurma ve versiyonlama uygulamasi

scripts.start:all: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "cyan,yellow" "npm start" "cd frontend && npm run dev -- --host"
scripts.git:push: git add -A && git commit -m "auto-update" && git push origin main
